    <span id="ctl00_MainContent_DetailedOutput"><h1 class="title">Uthul</h1>An uthul most often appears to be a dark, swirling cloud filled with flying debris and streaked with sudden flashes of lightning. Although they are clearly elemental in nature, uthuls are nearly always found on the Material Plane, where they hide among natural cloud formations, especially thunderstorms.<br /><br /><b><u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=5&General=true">Recall Knowledge - Elemental</a></u> (<u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=2">Arcana</a></u>, <u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=10">Nature</a></u>)</b>: DC 32<h1 class="title"><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=398">Uthul</a><span style="float:right;">Creature 14</span></h1><a target="_blank" href="Images\Monsters\Uthul.png"><img class="thumbnail" src="Images\Monsters\Uthul.png"></a><span alt="Chaotic Evil" class="traitalignment" title="Chaotic Evil">CE</span><span alt="Huge" class="traitsize" title="Huge">Huge</span><span alt="Air Trait" class="trait" title="Effects with the air trait either manipulate or conjure air. Those that manipulate air have no effect in a vacuum or an area without air. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of air or have a magical connection to that element."><a href="Traits.aspx?ID=5">Air</a></span><span alt="Elemental Trait" class="trait" title="Elementals are creatures directly tied to an element and native to the Elemental Planes. Elementals don’t need to breathe."><a href="Traits.aspx?ID=57">Elemental</a></span><br /><b>Source</b> <a href="https://paizo.com/products/btq01y0m?Pathfinder-Bestiary" target="_blank" class="external-link"><i>Bestiary pg. 317</i></a><br /><b>Perception</b> +20; darkvision<br /><b>Languages</b> <a href="Languages.aspx?ID=14"><u>Aquan</a></u><br /><b>Skills</b> <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=1"><u>Acrobatics</a></u> +29, <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=3"><u>Athletics</a></u> +27, <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=7"><u>Intimidation</a></u> +23, <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=15"><u>Stealth</a></u> +25<br /><b>Str</b> +7, <b>Dex</b> +7, <b>Con</b> +4, <b>Int</b> -1, <b>Wis</b> -2, <b>Cha</b> +3<hr /><b>AC</b> 36, <b>Fort</b> +28, <b>Ref</b> +29, <b>Will</b> +22<br /><b>HP</b> 250; <b>Immunities</b> electricity, paralyze, poison, sleep<br /><b>High Winds</b> (<a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=5">air</a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=206">aura</a>) 40 feet. Air in the aura is difficult terrain for Flying creatures without the air trait.<hr /><b>Speed</b> fly 100 feet; swiftness<br /><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> claw +29 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=170"><u>agile</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 3d12+11 slashing</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Ranged</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> debris +29 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=248"><u>range increment 60 feet</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 5d8+15 bludgeoning</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Lightning Crash</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png">  (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=56"><u>electricity</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=93"><u>incapacitation</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=147"><u>sonic</a></u>) The uthul unleashes a powerful bolt of lightning and a stunning thunderclap. The bolt deals 6d12 electricity damage to all creatures in a 30-foot line, with a DC 34 basic Reflex save, and every creature in a 20-foot emanation must attempt a DC 34 Fortitude save. The uthul can’t use Lightning Crash again for 1d4 rounds.<br><b>Critical Success</b> The creature is unaffected.<br><b>Success</b> The creature is stunned 1.<br><b>Failure</b> The creature is stunned for 1 round.<br><b>Critical Failure</b> The creature is stunned for 1d4 rounds.</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Swiftness</b> An uthul’s movement doesn’t trigger reactions.</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Whirlwind Form</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions_I.png">  (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=32"><u>concentrate</a></u>) The uthul transforms itself into a swirling vortex of storm and fury 10 feet wide and up to 40 feet tall. It stays in this form for 3 rounds or until it Dismisses the effect. While in this form, the uthul gains resistance 10 to physical damage and can move through other creatures. Its aura remains active, but it can’t make debris Strikes nor use Lightning Crash. Instead, any creature the uthul moves through takes 4d6 bludgeoning damage and 2d12 electricity damage. A creature can take this damage only once per round. A Large or smaller creature must also succeed at a DC 32 Reflex save or be picked up and held suspended within the vortex. Suspended creatures move with the uthul. A creature can attempt to escape by spending an action to attempt a DC 32 Reflex save (or a DC 32 Acrobatics check to maneuver in flight if it has a fly Speed). Upon escaping, or when the uthul transforms back into its storm cloud form, a suspended creature is hurled 1d4 × 10 feet in a random direction, then falls unless it can fly or otherwise remain aloft. After returning to its normal form, the uthul must wait 1 minute before it can use Whirlwind Form again.</span><h3 class="title"><img alt="Sidebar - Additional Lore" title="Sidebar - Additional Lore" style="height:20px; padding:2px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Icons\Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png"> Outcasts of Air</h3>Uthuls are thought to be an outcast group of beings that once dwelled on the Plane of Air. It is unclear whether their fury was the reason for their expulsion from that plane or if they grew implacable after being banished. Uthuls do not speak of their history to anyone and simply redouble their unending rage on any who dare to ask.</span>

  <script>
      initiateToggle(document.getElementById('theme-toggle'));
      initializeMenuToggle(document.getElementById('minMaxMenu'));
      var initializeSearch = function (search) {
          var button;
          var text;
          if (search.firstElementChild.classList.contains('search-input'))
              text = search.firstElementChild;
          if (search.lastElementChild.classList.contains('search-input'))
              text = search.lastElementChild;
          if (search.firstElementChild.classList.contains('search-button'))
              button = search.firstElementChild;
          if (search.lastElementChild.classList.contains('search-button'))
              button = search.lastElementChild;

          if (search) {
              search.addEventListener('keypress', function (e) {
                  if (e.keyCode == 13) {
                      e.preventDefault();
                      if (text.value != null && text.value.length > 0)
                          window.location = window.location.origin + "/Search.aspx?query=" + text.value;
                  }
              })
          }
          if (button) {
              button.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                  window.location = window.location.origin + "/Search.aspx?query=" + text.value;
              });
          }
      };
      var initializeExpand = function (toggle) {
          var targetAttrString = "[data-target='" + toggle.dataset.toggle + "']";
          //target = menu to be collapsed
          var target = document.querySelector(targetAttrString);
          toggle.addEventListener('click', function () {
              var expanded = target.classList.contains('expanded');
              expanded = !expanded;
              if (expanded) {
                  //hide other in group if exists
                  if (target.dataset.group) {
                      var otherExpanded = document.querySelector('.expanded[data-group="' + target.dataset.group + '"]');
                      if (otherExpanded) {
                          otherExpanded.classList.remove('expanded');
                      }
                  }
                  target.classList.add('expanded');
              } else {
                  target.classList.remove('expanded');
              }
          });
      };
      (function () {
          //toggles = link that expands/collapses target
          var toggles = document.querySelectorAll('[data-toggle]');
          toggles.forEach(function (toggle) {
              initializeExpand(toggle);
          });
          //searches
          var searches = document.querySelectorAll('.search');
          searches.forEach(function (search) {
              initializeSearch(search);
          });
      })();
  </script>
